altername_name: Heroes of Might and Magic III
name: Heroes of Might and Magic III
overview: Sega Dreamcast unreleased game Heroes of Might and Magic III. The Dreamcast port of Heroes of Might and Magic III: The Restoration of Erathia was planned, it was developed but very unfortunately it was canceled. This game would have been one of the best Dreamcast games in terms of quality. Wonderful music, great artwork, etc. Heroes III is considered the best game in the saga.
